title: Get started
text: NCAA uses unique team ID women's men's volleyball team season. first need get ID find_team_id(). ‚Äôll use Nebraska üåΩ illustrate functions {ncaavolleyballr}. However, find team ID, first know exact team name NCAA uses reference team. Nebraska‚Äôs team name Nebraska, Neb., University Nebraska-Lincoln, UNL, something else? can use find_team_name() get vector teams match pattern. Looks like ‚Äôs ‚ÄúNebraska‚Äù. now can pass find_team_id() along year ‚Äôre interested . function queries two data sets ship package: wvb_teams mvb_teams. two data sets simply output get_teams() function applied sports ‚ÄúWVB‚Äù ‚ÄúMVB‚Äù respectively. get_teams() function can applied sports get list team IDs. since ‚Äôve already done men‚Äôs women‚Äôs volleyball, won‚Äôt need use get_teams(). OK, let‚Äôs find Nebraska‚Äôs team ID 2024. ‚Äôll need team ID access team‚Äôs statistics. can either assign output object just add top pipeline. can also pass vectors team names years find team IDs multiple teams years. Note processed per year, last example teams ID‚Äôs Nebraska Wisconsin 2020 2021, etc.

title: Get started
text: Now team ID, can use access season summary statistics particular team year (e.g., Nebraska 2024). can access team statistics team_season_stats() player statistics player_season_stats(). NCAA‚Äôs main page team year includes tab called ‚ÄúSchedule/Results‚Äù. team_season_stats() function extracts information team‚Äôs venue, coach, records, well table schedule results. returns list, can subset specific components $. instance, wanted calculate average attendance per game: Wow, Nebraska volleyball attracted attendees per game 2021 Oakland Athletics professional baseball team! NCAA‚Äôs main page team includes tab called ‚ÄúTeam Statistics‚Äù (e.g., Nebraska 2024). player_season_stats() function extracts table player statistics season, well team opponent statistics (though can omitted). returns players, along TEAM, opponent, overall team summaries. include player stats, set team_stats = FALSE. returns stats included NCAA:
code: (neb2024team <- find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024) |>    team_season_info()) #> $team_info #>      team_id team_name conference_id conference div   yr    season #> 1466  585290  Nebraska           827    Big Ten   1 2024 2024-2025 #>  #> $arena #>                  Arena name                    Capacity  #> "Bob Devaney Sports Center"                     "7,907"  #>                  Year built  #>                      "1975"  #>  #> $coach #>               Name         Alma mater            Seasons             Record  #>        "John Cook" "San Diego - 1979"               "32"          "883-176"  #>  #> $record #>      Overall record      Overall streak   Conference record   Conference streak  #>      "33-3 (0.917)"        "Streak: L1"      "19-1 (0.950)"        "Streak: L1"  #>         Home record         Home streak         Road record         Road streak  #>      "22-0 (1.000)"       "Streak: W45"      "10-2 (0.833)"        "Streak: W1"  #>      Neutral record      Neutral streak Non-division record Non-division streak  #>       "1-1 (0.500)"        "Streak: L1"       "0-0 (0.000)"         "Streak: 0"  #>  #> $schedule #> # A tibble: 36 √ó 4 #>    Date       Opponent                 Result Attendance #>    <chr>      <chr>                    <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 08/27/2024 Kentucky @Louisville, KY W 3-1  9,280      #>  2 08/30/2024 A&M-Corpus Christi       W 3-0  8,956      #>  3 08/31/2024 TCU                      W 3-1  8,695      #>  4 09/03/2024 @ SMU                    L 0-3  6,773      #>  5 09/05/2024 The Citadel              W 3-0  8,607      #>  6 09/07/2024 Montana St.              W 3-0  8,456      #>  7 09/10/2024 Creighton                W 3-2  8,924      #>  8 09/13/2024 Arizona St.              W 3-0  8,772      #>  9 09/14/2024 Wichita St.              W 3-0  8,541      #> 10 09/18/2024 Stanford                 W 3-0  8,952      #> # ‚Ñπ 26 more rows neb2024team$schedule |>    dplyr::pull(Attendance) |>    sub(",", "", x = _) |>    as.numeric() |>    mean() #> [1] 8765.333 find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024) |>    player_season_stats() find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024) |>    player_season_stats(team_stats = FALSE)

title: Get started

code: (neb2024team <- find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024) |>    team_season_info()) #> $team_info #>      team_id team_name conference_id conference div   yr    season #> 1466  585290  Nebraska           827    Big Ten   1 2024 2024-2025 #>  #> $arena #>                  Arena name                    Capacity  #> "Bob Devaney Sports Center"                     "7,907"  #>                  Year built  #>                      "1975"  #>  #> $coach #>               Name         Alma mater            Seasons             Record  #>        "John Cook" "San Diego - 1979"               "32"          "883-176"  #>  #> $record #>      Overall record      Overall streak   Conference record   Conference streak  #>      "33-3 (0.917)"        "Streak: L1"      "19-1 (0.950)"        "Streak: L1"  #>         Home record         Home streak         Road record         Road streak  #>      "22-0 (1.000)"       "Streak: W45"      "10-2 (0.833)"        "Streak: W1"  #>      Neutral record      Neutral streak Non-division record Non-division streak  #>       "1-1 (0.500)"        "Streak: L1"       "0-0 (0.000)"         "Streak: 0"  #>  #> $schedule #> # A tibble: 36 √ó 4 #>    Date       Opponent                 Result Attendance #>    <chr>      <chr>                    <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 08/27/2024 Kentucky @Louisville, KY W 3-1  9,280      #>  2 08/30/2024 A&M-Corpus Christi       W 3-0  8,956      #>  3 08/31/2024 TCU                      W 3-1  8,695      #>  4 09/03/2024 @ SMU                    L 0-3  6,773      #>  5 09/05/2024 The Citadel              W 3-0  8,607      #>  6 09/07/2024 Montana St.              W 3-0  8,456      #>  7 09/10/2024 Creighton                W 3-2  8,924      #>  8 09/13/2024 Arizona St.              W 3-0  8,772      #>  9 09/14/2024 Wichita St.              W 3-0  8,541      #> 10 09/18/2024 Stanford                 W 3-0  8,952      #> # ‚Ñπ 26 more rows neb2024team$schedule |>    dplyr::pull(Attendance) |>    sub(",", "", x = _) |>    as.numeric() |>    mean() #> [1] 8765.333

what: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: Inspired NCAA data extraction functions {baseballr} package, goal {ncaavolleyballr} extract women‚Äôs men‚Äôs volleyball information NCAA website. functions package can extract team records/schedules player statistics 2020-2024 NCAA women‚Äôs men‚Äôs divisions , II, III volleyball teams. Functions can aggregate statistics teams, conferences, divisions, custom groups teams.

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: can install developmental versions GitHub :

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: NCAA uses unique team ID women‚Äôs men‚Äôs volleyball team season. first need get ID find_team_id(). instance, find ID Penn State‚Äôs 2024 season:

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: team ID, can now extract team information arena, coach, record, schedule team_season_stats(). also roster overall season performance data individual players player_season_stats(). default, functions return information women‚Äôs teams, can set return men‚Äôs information setting sport = "MVB". can also aggregate data across conferences, divisions, custom groups conference_stats(), division_stats(), group_stats().
code: team_info <- find_team_id("Penn St.", 2024) |>    team_season_stats() team_info$arena #> Arena name   Capacity Year built  #> "Rec Hall"    "5,812"     "1928" team_info$coach #>                      Name                Alma mater                   Seasons  #> "Katie Schumacher-Cawley"         "Penn St. - 2002"                      "12"  #>                    Record  #>                 "209-165" team_info$record #>      Overall record      Overall streak   Conference record   Conference streak  #>      "35-2 (0.946)"       "Streak: W12"      "19-1 (0.950)"        "Streak: W7"  #>         Home record         Home streak         Road record         Road streak  #>      "20-0 (1.000)"       "Streak: W24"      "13-2 (0.867)"        "Streak: W3"  #>      Neutral record      Neutral streak Non-division record Non-division streak  #>       "2-0 (1.000)"        "Streak: W3"       "0-0 (0.000)"         "Streak: 0" team_info$schedule find_team_id("Penn St.", 2024) |>    player_season_stats()

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: NCAA also uses unique contest ID women‚Äôs men‚Äôs volleyball match. easiest way get ID find_team_contest(), returns contest ID matches particular season (using Team ID provided find_team_id()). instance, find contest ID 2024 National Championship match Louisville Penn State: , can see contest ID 6080706. pass contest ID player_match_stats() function, ‚Äôll get list two data frames‚Äîone team contest‚Äîcontain player statistics match. want get just Penn State player data, can set team = "Penn St.". Play--play data also available match_pbp(). returns data frame events players.
code: find_team_id("Penn St.", 2024) |>    find_team_contests() |>    tail() player_match_stats(contest = "6080706", team = "Penn St.") match_pbp(contest = "6080706") |>    head(10)

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: cite {ncaavolleyballr}, use: Stevens, Jeffrey R. (2025). ncaavolleyballr: Extract data NCAA women‚Äôs volleyball website. (version 0.3.0) https://github.com/JeffreyRStevens/ncaavolleyballr

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: Many thanks Bill Petti making code NCAA stats extraction freely available {baseballr} package. thank Tyler Widdison inspiring extract play--play data (check {ncaavolleyballR} package similar functionality). volleyball background logo designed Freepik.

what: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons ‚Äî conference_stats
title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons ‚Äî conference_stats
text: wrapper around group_stats() extracts season, match, pbp data players teams chosen conference. season stats, aggregates player data team data separate data frames combines list. match pbp stats, aggregates data frame. Conferences names can found ncaa_conferences.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons ‚Äî conference_stats
code: conference_stats(   year = NULL,   conf = NULL,   level = NULL,   sport = "WVB",   save = FALSE,   path = "." )

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons ‚Äî conference_stats
text: year Numeric vector years fall desired seasons. conf NCAA conference name. level Character string defining whether aggregate "season", "match", play--play ("pbp") data. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball). save Logical whether save statistics locally CSVs (default FALSE). path Character string path save statistics files.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons ‚Äî conference_stats
text: season level, returns list data frames player statistics team statistics. match pbp levels, returns data frame player statistics play--play information respectively.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons ‚Äî conference_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ conference_stats(year = 2024, conf = "Peach Belt", level = "season") conference_stats(year = 2023, conf = "Big West", level = "match", sport = "MVB") conference_stats(year = 2024, conf = "Peach Belt", level = "pbp", save = TRUE, path = "data/") } # }

code: division_stats(   year = NULL,   division = 1,   level = NULL,   sport = "WVB",   save = FALSE,   path = "." )

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons ‚Äî division_stats
text: year Numeric vector years fall desired seasons. division NCAA division (must 1, 2, 3). level Character string defining whether aggregate "season", "match", play--play ("pbp") data. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball). save Logical whether save statistics locally CSVs (default FALSE). path Character string path save statistics files.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons ‚Äî division_stats
text: season level, returns list data frames player statistics team statistics. match pbp levels, returns data frame player statistics play--play information respectively.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons ‚Äî division_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ division_stats(year = 2024, level = "season") division_stats(year = 2023, division = 3, level = "match", sport = "MVB") division_stats(year = 2024, level = "pbp", save = TRUE, path = "data/") } # }

what: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information ‚Äî group_stats
title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information ‚Äî group_stats
text: function aggregates player statistics play--play information within season applying player_season_stats(), player_match_stats(), match_pbp() across groups teams (player_season_stats()) across contests within season (player_match_stats() match_pbp()). season stats, aggregates player data team data separate data frames combines list. instance, want extract data teams women's 2024 Final Four, pass vector c("Louisville", "Nebraska", "Penn State", "Pittsburgh") function. match play--play data team, pass single team name year. Team names can found ncaa_teams using find_team_name().

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information ‚Äî group_stats
code: group_stats(teams = NULL, year = NULL, level = "season", sport = "WVB")

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information ‚Äî group_stats
text: teams Character vector team names aggregate. year Numeric vector years fall desired seasons. level Character string defining whether aggregate "season", "match", play--play ("pbp") data. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball).

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information ‚Äî group_stats
text: season level, returns list data frames player statistics team statistics. match pbp levels, returns data frame player statistics play--play information respectively.

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information ‚Äî group_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ group_stats(teams = c("Louisville", "Nebraska", "Penn St.", "Pittsburgh"), year = 2024, level = "season") group_stats(teams = c("UCLA", "Long Beach St."), year = 2023, level = "season", sport = "MVB") group_stats(teams = "Nebraska", year = 2024, level = "match") group_stats(teams = "Nebraska", year = 2024, level = "pbp") } # }

what: ncaavolleyballr: Extract Data from NCAA Women's and Men's Volleyball Website ‚Äî ncaavolleyballr-package
title: ncaavolleyballr: Extract Data from NCAA Women's and Men's Volleyball Website ‚Äî ncaavolleyballr-package
text: Extracts team records/schedules player statistics 2020-2024 NCAA women's men's divisions , II, III volleyball teams. Functions can aggregate statistics teams, conferences, divisions, custom groups teams.

title: ncaavolleyballr: Extract Data from NCAA Women's and Men's Volleyball Website ‚Äî ncaavolleyballr-package
text: Maintainer: Jeffrey R. Stevens jeffrey.r.stevens@protonmail.com (ORCID) [copyright holder]

what: Extract player statistics for a particular match ‚Äî player_match_stats
title: Extract player statistics for a particular match ‚Äî player_match_stats
text: NCAA's page match/contest includes tab called "Individual Statistics". function extracts tables player match statistics home away teams, well team statistics (though can omitted). particular team specified, team's statistics returned.

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match ‚Äî player_match_stats
code: player_match_stats(   contest = NULL,   team = NULL,   team_stats = TRUE,   sport = "WVB" )

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match ‚Äî player_match_stats
text: contest Contest ID determined NCAA match. find ID, use find_team_contests() team season. team Name school. Must match name used NCAA. Find exact team name find_team_name(). team_stats Logical indicating whether include (TRUE) exclude (FALSE) team statistics. Default includes team statistics player statistics. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball).

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match ‚Äî player_match_stats
text: default, returns list two data frames: home away team match statistics. team specified, single data frame returned.

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match ‚Äî player_match_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ player_match_stats(contest = "6080706") player_match_stats(contest = "6080706", team = "Louisville") player_match_stats(contest = "4475421", team_stats = FALSE, sport = "MVB") } # }

what: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season ‚Äî player_season_stats
title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season ‚Äî player_season_stats
text: NCAA's main page team includes tab called "Team Statistics". function extracts table player statistics season, well team opponent statistics (though can omitted).

title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season ‚Äî player_season_stats
Extract player statistics from a particular team and season ‚Äî player_season_stats
text: team_id Team ID determined NCAA season. find ID, use find_team_id(). team_stats Logical indicating whether include (TRUE) exclude (FALSE) team statistics. Default includes team statistics player statistics.

title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season ‚Äî player_season_stats
text: Returns data frame player statistics. Note hometown high school added 2024.

title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season ‚Äî player_season_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ player_season_stats(team_id = "585290") player_season_stats(team_id = find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024), team_stats = FALSE) player_season_stats(team_id = find_team_id("UCLA", 2023, sport = "MVB")) } # }

what: Extract team summary statistics for all matches in a particular season ‚Äî team_match_stats
title: Extract team summary statistics for all matches in a particular season ‚Äî team_match_stats
text: NCAA's main page team includes tab called "Game Game" section called "Game Game Stats". function extracts team's summary statistics match season.

title: Extract team summary statistics for all matches in a particular season ‚Äî team_match_stats
Extract team summary statistics for all matches in a particular season ‚Äî team_match_stats
text: team_id Team ID determined NCAA season. find ID, use find_team_id(). opponent Logical indicating whether include team's stats (FALSE) opponent's stats (TRUE). Default set FALSE, returning team stats. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball).

title: Extract team summary statistics for all matches in a particular season ‚Äî team_match_stats
text: Returns data frame summary team statistics match season.

title: Extract team summary statistics for all matches in a particular season ‚Äî team_match_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ team_match_stats(team_id = "585290") team_match_stats(team_id = find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024), opponent = TRUE) team_match_stats(team_id = "573670", sport = "MVB") } # }

what: Extract arena, coach, record, and schedule information for a particular team and season ‚Äî team_season_info
title: Extract arena, coach, record, and schedule information for a particular team and season ‚Äî team_season_info
text: NCAA's main page team includes tab called "Schedule/Results". function extracts information team's venue, coach, records, well table schedule results. returns list, can subset specific components $ (e.g., coach information object called output, use output$coach).

title: Extract arena, coach, record, and schedule information for a particular team and season ‚Äî team_season_info
Extract arena, coach, record, and schedule information for a particular team and season ‚Äî team_season_info
text: team_id Team ID determined NCAA season. find ID, use find_team_id().

title: Extract arena, coach, record, and schedule information for a particular team and season ‚Äî team_season_info
text: Returns list includes arena, coach, schedule, record information.

title: Extract arena, coach, record, and schedule information for a particular team and season ‚Äî team_season_info
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ team_season_info(team_id = "585290") team_season_info(team_id = find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024)) team_season_info(team_id = find_team_id("UCLA", 2023, sport = "MVB")) } # }

what: Extract teams statistics for season statistics from 2001-2024 ‚Äî team_season_stats
title: Extract teams statistics for season statistics from 2001-2024 ‚Äî team_season_stats
text: NCAA's main page team includes tab called "Game Game" section called "Career Totals". Though page shows one season's worth information, function extracts season summary stats starting 2001. included conference starting 2020 (conference data previous seasons currently available).

title: Extract teams statistics for season statistics from 2001-2024 ‚Äî team_season_stats
Extract teams statistics for season statistics from 2001-2024 ‚Äî team_season_stats
text: team Name school. Must match name used NCAA. Find exact team name find_team_name(). opponent Logical indicating whether include team's stats (FALSE) opponent's stats (TRUE). Default set FALSE, returning team stats. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball).

title: Extract teams statistics for season statistics from 2001-2024 ‚Äî team_season_stats
text: Returns data frame summary team statistics season.

title: Extract teams statistics for season statistics from 2001-2024 ‚Äî team_season_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ team_season_stats(team = "Nebraska") team_season_stats(team = "Nebraska", opponent = TRUE) team_season_stats(team = "UCLA", sport = "MVB") } # }

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.3.0
text: Improve output match_pbp() parse events players. Improve output find_team_contests() include record, attendance, canceled matches. Add match play--play levels group_stats(). Fix bug group_stats() matches canceled. Replace term ‚Äúvisitor‚Äù ‚Äúaway‚Äù. DEPRECATION: group_player_stats() renamed group_stats(). conference_player_stats() renamed conference_season_stats(). division_player_stats() renamed division_season_stats().

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.2.0
text: Add match-level functions find_team_contests(), player_match_stats(), test match_pbp() extracting match/contest IDs, player statistics, play--play information. DEPRECATION: team_player_stats() renamed player_season_stats().

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.1.0
text: Initial release. Add season-level statistics extraction `. Add conference, division, custom group aggregation conference_player_stats(), division_player_stats(), group_player_stats() Create website logo.
